resources.description: The computer game interface is the outward manifestation of a computer game, and it is also the direct interaction part of between the game and the game user. Good game interface will make the game user completely immerse into the virtual world created by the game, otherwise it would make the game user be at loss or upset due to the poorly designed interface elements. Therefore, in the computer game interface design, user-involvement is very important. This paper mainly discusses the method of building a user-involvement iterative computer game interface design, including the objective and main features of the method, the user’s fatigue analysis, and the complete design flow.
resources.name: Study of the User-Involvement Iterative Computer Game Interface Design Method

name: study-of-the-user-involvement-iterative-computer-game-interface-design-method

title: Study of the User-Involvement Iterative Computer Game Interface Design Method
